TopicTitle: Mac OS Catalina, KSP won't start

Articles.Content: Just upgraded my Mac OS to Catalina and now KSP will not load. The progress bar is stuck at half-way across the screen. Does anyone else have this problem?

My loading bar stops when loading ContractPacks RemoteTech items. About to try removing that and troubleshoot my install. Hoping I can still play, just upgraded my MBP to Catalina last night, just after getting (most) of my massive Station Science mod-enabled station with 18 (!) scientists on board. *crossed fingers*

You can visit this thread, which has a workaround that should get your versions going.

The thread does not note if mods are installed on their installs.

Be mindful that, when KSP stalls on loading, it's almost certainly because of mod incompatibility.

Remove them ALL, or make a fresh installation, test, and then find and remove any offending mods if needed.
